document_data.name: Faizah Tin
document_data.mainbody: '''Faizah Tin''' was a [[mage]] who lived in the Realms during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was somewhat of a cynic, believing that others would not do good merely for the sake of it.
document_data.Relationships: Faizah Tin was an acquaintance of an [[elven]] warrior named [[Vail]].
document_data.History:
At some point, Faizah joined Vail on a venture that saw them and some other mercenaries storming the tower of the famous [[wizard]] [[Ramazith Flamesinger]]. When they stormed the mage's tower in the [[Baldur's Gate/Temples District|Temples District]] of [[Baldur's Gate]], the entire party was ''[[petrified]]'' by a [[basilisk]].

Having been turned into stone, the lot of them were sold to an art collector by the name of [[Felonius Gist]]. The statues were considered quite the unique pieces of art in luxurious surroundings of the [[Gist]] noble estate in the city.
